overview:
As Senior Vice President of Sales Operations, Jim Bladich is responsible for worldwide sales operations, internal infrastructure activities (including product pricing and sales help desk), CRM, data extraction and analysis, sales compensation, revenue recognition, sales forecasting and staffing, as well as transaction booking, negotiating, and managing enterprise and other large account relationships.

Bladich has been with ASG since 2000, serving in a variety of management roles, including the management of customer service and the development and implementation of internal business practices and processes. He was also instrumental in designing and implementing ASGâ€™s software licensing polices and is a regular speaker at Software Asset Management tradeshows and symposiums.
